name: Evil Eye
description:
WASD / Arrow keys to move

Space to Attack

Use left mouse button to open the "Character Menu" in the bottom left corner.
(In Character Menu you can update your weapon with collected coins, change character skin and keep track of your XP)

After respawn you return with your collected XP, updates and coins.

-------------------------
Hey!
I had so much fun learning how to create my first RPG game and I have decided to customise it and add few more levels just to see how it goes. It is a short rogue-like game. The aim is to free the prisoners and end the reign of the "Evil Eye".

I will be moving to a different project now.

Have fun and good luck
